EmailTemplate.subject: Doctor Evidence-Sanofi Post Training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|Doctor Evidence-Sanofi Post-training email|*
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for attending the first part of our Intermediate Training and for your patience with our technical issues. Please find attached the slide decks from the presentation. You've also been enrolled in a site where you can view all the videos from today's presentation, as well as some quickguides for the topics covered (in Additional References). You can access the materials here: https://dre.litmos.com?C=483766. (Your email is your username, and you'll be prompted to create a password.)
PLEASE SELECT THE SESSION YOU WOULD LIKE TO ATTEND FOR THE SECOND INTERMEDIATE TRAINING BY CLICKING ON THE LINK OF YOUR CHOICE.: 18 Jan 2018 ~ Intermediate 3-4 | 9 AM-12 PM EST/ 3-6 PM CET 15 Feb 2018 ~ Intermediate 3-4 | 9 AM-12 PM EST/ 3-6 PM CET
Please don't hesitate to be in touch with any comments, suggestions or questions.
Thank You,
Nancy Morgan Director of Learning and Development Doctor Evidence 301 Arizona Ave Suite 301 Santa Monica CA 90401 847-507-1451
